unittitle_ssm: Queens County, N.Y. enslaved people bills of sale
abstract_ssm: This collection contains bills of sale for the purchase of enslaved people in Queens County, N.Y. from 1751 to 1793, prior to the abolition of slavery in New York State. Three of the six bills of sale document the purchase of enslaved people by the Wyckoff Family of Queens County, as well as John Van Wyck.
subject_ssm: African Americans -- New York (State) -- Queens County
collection_ssm: Queens County, N.Y. enslaved people bills of sale
heading_ssm: Queens County, N.Y. enslaved people bills of sale
